00016 #ifndef B3_TRANSFORM_UTIL_H
00017 #define B3_TRANSFORM_UTIL_H

00019 #include "b3Transform.h"
00020 #define B3_ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD b3Scalar(0.5)*B3_HALF_PI
00021 
00022 
00023 
00024 
00025 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3 b3AabbSupport(const b3Vector3& halfExtents,const b3Vector3& supportDir)
00026 {
00027         return b3MakeVector3(supportDir.getX() < b3Scalar(0.0) ? -halfExtents.getX() : halfExtents.getX(),
00028       supportDir.getY() < b3Scalar(0.0) ? -halfExtents.getY() : halfExtents.getY(),
00029       supportDir.getZ() < b3Scalar(0.0) ? -halfExtents.getZ() : halfExtents.getZ()); 
00030 }

00036 
00038 class b3TransformUtil
00039 {
00040 
00041 public:
00042 
00043         static void integrateTransform(const b3Transform& curTrans,const b3Vector3& linvel,const b3Vector3& angvel,b3Scalar timeStep,b3Transform& predictedTransform)
00044         {
00045                 predictedTransform.setOrigin(curTrans.getOrigin() + linvel * timeStep);
00046 //      #define QUATERNION_DERIVATIVE
00047         #ifdef QUATERNION_DERIVATIVE
00048                 b3Quaternion predictedOrn = curTrans.getRotation();
00049                 predictedOrn += (angvel * predictedOrn) * (timeStep * b3Scalar(0.5));
00050                 predictedOrn.normalize();
00051         #else
00052                 //Exponential map
00053                 //google for "Practical Parameterization of Rotations Using the Exponential Map", F. Sebastian Grassia
00054 
00055                 b3Vector3 axis;
00056                 b3Scalar        fAngle = angvel.length(); 
00057                 //limit the angular motion
00058                 if (fAngle*timeStep > B3_ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD)
00059                 {
00060                         fAngle = B3_ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD / timeStep;
00061                 }
00062 
00063                 if ( fAngle < b3Scalar(0.001) )
00064                 {
00065                         // use Taylor's expansions of sync function
00066                         axis   = angvel*( b3Scalar(0.5)*timeStep-(timeStep*timeStep*timeStep)*(b3Scalar(0.020833333333))*fAngle*fAngle );
00067                 }
00068                 else
00069                 {
00070                         // sync(fAngle) = sin(c*fAngle)/t
00071                         axis   = angvel*( b3Sin(b3Scalar(0.5)*fAngle*timeStep)/fAngle );
00072                 }
00073                 b3Quaternion dorn (axis.getX(),axis.getY(),axis.getZ(),b3Cos( fAngle*timeStep*b3Scalar(0.5) ));
00074                 b3Quaternion orn0 = curTrans.getRotation();
00075 
00076                 b3Quaternion predictedOrn = dorn * orn0;
00077                 predictedOrn.normalize();
00078         #endif
00079                 predictedTransform.setRotation(predictedOrn);
00080         }
00081 
00082         static void     calculateVelocityQuaternion(const b3Vector3& pos0,const b3Vector3& pos1,const b3Quaternion& orn0,const b3Quaternion& orn1,b3Scalar timeStep,b3Vector3& linVel,b3Vector3& angVel)
00083         {
00084                 linVel = (pos1 - pos0) / timeStep;
00085                 b3Vector3 axis;
00086                 b3Scalar  angle;
00087                 if (orn0 != orn1)
00088                 {
00089                         calculateDiffAxisAngleQuaternion(orn0,orn1,axis,angle);
00090                         angVel = axis * angle / timeStep;
00091                 } else
00092                 {
00093                         angVel.setValue(0,0,0);
00094                 }
00095         }
00096 
00097         static void calculateDiffAxisAngleQuaternion(const b3Quaternion& orn0,const b3Quaternion& orn1a,b3Vector3& axis,b3Scalar& angle)
00098         {
00099                 b3Quaternion orn1 = orn0.nearest(orn1a);
00100                 b3Quaternion dorn = orn1 * orn0.inverse();
00101                 angle = dorn.getAngle();
00102                 axis = b3MakeVector3(dorn.getX(),dorn.getY(),dorn.getZ());
00103                 axis[3] = b3Scalar(0.);
00104                 //check for axis length
00105                 b3Scalar len = axis.length2();
00106                 if (len < B3_EPSILON*B3_EPSILON)
00107                         axis = b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(1.),b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.));
00108                 else
00109                         axis /= b3Sqrt(len);
00110         }
00111 
00112         static void     calculateVelocity(const b3Transform& transform0,const b3Transform& transform1,b3Scalar timeStep,b3Vector3& linVel,b3Vector3& angVel)
00113         {
00114                 linVel = (transform1.getOrigin() - transform0.getOrigin()) / timeStep;
00115                 b3Vector3 axis;
00116                 b3Scalar  angle;
00117                 calculateDiffAxisAngle(transform0,transform1,axis,angle);
00118                 angVel = axis * angle / timeStep;
00119         }
00120 
00121         static void calculateDiffAxisAngle(const b3Transform& transform0,const b3Transform& transform1,b3Vector3& axis,b3Scalar& angle)
00122         {
00123                 b3Matrix3x3 dmat = transform1.getBasis() * transform0.getBasis().inverse();
00124                 b3Quaternion dorn;
00125                 dmat.getRotation(dorn);
00126 
00128                 dorn.normalize();
00129                 
00130                 angle = dorn.getAngle();
00131                 axis = b3MakeVector3(dorn.getX(),dorn.getY(),dorn.getZ());
00132                 axis[3] = b3Scalar(0.);
00133                 //check for axis length
00134                 b3Scalar len = axis.length2();
00135                 if (len < B3_EPSILON*B3_EPSILON)
00136                         axis = b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(1.),b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.));
00137                 else
00138                         axis /= b3Sqrt(len);
00139         }
00140 
00141 };

00146 class   b3ConvexSeparatingDistanceUtil
00147 {
00148         b3Quaternion    m_ornA;
00149         b3Quaternion    m_ornB;
00150         b3Vector3       m_posA;
00151         b3Vector3       m_posB;
00152         
00153         b3Vector3       m_separatingNormal;
00154 
00155         b3Scalar        m_boundingRadiusA;
00156         b3Scalar        m_boundingRadiusB;
00157         b3Scalar        m_separatingDistance;
00158 
00159 public:
00160 
00161         b3ConvexSeparatingDistanceUtil(b3Scalar boundingRadiusA,b3Scalar        boundingRadiusB)
00162                 :m_boundingRadiusA(boundingRadiusA),
00163                 m_boundingRadiusB(boundingRadiusB),
00164                 m_separatingDistance(0.f)
00165         {
00166         }
00167 
00168         b3Scalar        getConservativeSeparatingDistance()
00169         {
00170                 return m_separatingDistance;
00171         }
00172 
00173         void    updateSeparatingDistance(const b3Transform& transA,const b3Transform& transB)
00174         {
00175                 const b3Vector3& toPosA = transA.getOrigin();
00176                 const b3Vector3& toPosB = transB.getOrigin();
00177                 b3Quaternion toOrnA = transA.getRotation();
00178                 b3Quaternion toOrnB = transB.getRotation();
00179 
00180                 if (m_separatingDistance>0.f)
00181                 {
00182                         
00183 
00184                         b3Vector3 linVelA,angVelA,linVelB,angVelB;
00185                         b3TransformUtil::calculateVelocityQuaternion(m_posA,toPosA,m_ornA,toOrnA,b3Scalar(1.),linVelA,angVelA);
00186                         b3TransformUtil::calculateVelocityQuaternion(m_posB,toPosB,m_ornB,toOrnB,b3Scalar(1.),linVelB,angVelB);
00187                         b3Scalar maxAngularProjectedVelocity = angVelA.length() * m_boundingRadiusA + angVelB.length() * m_boundingRadiusB;
00188                         b3Vector3 relLinVel = (linVelB-linVelA);
00189                         b3Scalar relLinVelocLength = relLinVel.dot(m_separatingNormal);
00190                         if (relLinVelocLength<0.f)
00191                         {
00192                                 relLinVelocLength = 0.f;
00193                         }
00194         
00195                         b3Scalar        projectedMotion = maxAngularProjectedVelocity +relLinVelocLength;
00196                         m_separatingDistance -= projectedMotion;
00197                 }
00198         
00199                 m_posA = toPosA;
00200                 m_posB = toPosB;
00201                 m_ornA = toOrnA;
00202                 m_ornB = toOrnB;
00203         }
00204 
00205         void    initSeparatingDistance(const b3Vector3& separatingVector,b3Scalar separatingDistance,const b3Transform& transA,const b3Transform& transB)
00206         {
00207                 m_separatingDistance = separatingDistance;
00208 
00209                 if (m_separatingDistance>0.f)
00210                 {
00211                         m_separatingNormal = separatingVector;
00212                         
00213                         const b3Vector3& toPosA = transA.getOrigin();
00214                         const b3Vector3& toPosB = transB.getOrigin();
00215                         b3Quaternion toOrnA = transA.getRotation();
00216                         b3Quaternion toOrnB = transB.getRotation();
00217                         m_posA = toPosA;
00218                         m_posB = toPosB;
00219                         m_ornA = toOrnA;
00220                         m_ornB = toOrnB;
00221                 }
00222         }
00223 
00224 };
